00102 TripleString
00103 static parseQuery(string q) {
00104     size_t pos_a = 0, pos_b;
00105     TripleString qstring;
00106 
00107     // Reads the subject
00108     pos_b = q.find(" ", pos_a);
00109     qstring.x = q.substr(pos_a, pos_b - pos_a);
00110     pos_a = pos_b + 1;
00111 
00112     // Reads the predicate
00113     pos_b = q.find(" ", pos_a);
00114     qstring.y = q.substr(pos_a, pos_b - pos_a);
00115     pos_a = pos_b + 1;
00116 
00117     // Reads the predicate
00118     pos_b = q.find(" ", pos_a);
00119     qstring.z = q.substr(pos_a, pos_b - pos_a);
00120     pos_a = pos_b;
00121 
00122     return qstring;
00123 }
00124 
00129 void
00130 static getTime(DataTime *t) {
00131     struct rusage buffer;
00132     struct timeval tp;
00133     struct timezone tzp;
00134 
00135     getrusage(RUSAGE_SELF, &buffer);
00136     gettimeofday(&tp, &tzp);
00137 
00138     t->user = (double) buffer.ru_utime.tv_sec + 1.0e-6
00139             * buffer.ru_utime.tv_usec;
00140     t->total = (double) tp.tv_sec + 1.0e-6 * tp.tv_usec;
00141 }

00163 void static printHelp(char *exe) {
00164     cout << "\n" << exe << "[Options]\n";
00165     cout
00166             << "        -p --parse <config_file>              Parse data set within the given <config_file>\n";
00167     cout
00168             << "        -l --load <file>                      Load HDT structure into memory. Access triples console if serialize command is not given\n";
00169     cout
00170             << "            -s --serialize [format]           Serialize the loaded HDT representation to a given format: ntriples (default), rdfxml, turtle, rdfxml-abbrev, rdfxml-xmp, atom, json-triples, json, dot\n";
00171     cout
00172             << "            -o --output <file>               Serialize output (output.rdf by default)\n";
00173     cout << "        -h --help                             Show this help\n";
00174     cout
00175             << "        -c --console                          Entering console mode\n";
00176 }

00181 void static printHelpConsole() {
00182     cout
00183             << "        parse <config_file>            Parse data set within the given <config_file>\n";
00184     cout
00185             << "        load <file>                    Load HDT structure into memory and access triples console\n";
00186     cout << "        help                           Show this help\n";
00187     cout << "        exit                           Exit console mode\n";
00188 }

00196 void static stringExplode(string str, string separator, vector<string>* results) {
00197 
00198     int found;
00199     found = str.find_first_of(separator);
00200     while (found != string::npos) {
00201         if (found > 0) {
00202 
00203             results->push_back(str.substr(0, found));
00204         }
00205         str = str.substr(found + 1);
00206         found = str.find_first_of(separator);
00207     }
00208     if (str.length() > 0) {
00209         results->push_back(str);
00210     }
00211 }
